jodd.log

Class LoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class LoggerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger factory.

      • setLoggerProvider

        public static void setLoggerProvider(LoggerProvider loggerProvider)
        Sets LoggerProvider instance used for creating new Loggers.

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Returns logger for given class by simply using the class name.
        See Also:
        getLogger(String)

      • enableCache

        public static void enableCache()
        Enables cache. Previous cache is removed.

      • disableCache

        public static void disableCache()
        Disables the cache.

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Returns logger for given name. Repeated calls to this method with the same argument should return the very same instance of the logger.
